conversations.content: How much did I spend on shopping today?

<|Function_Thought|>
The current date is May 19, 2024. To determine how much was spent on shopping today, I need to view the order history and check for any transactions made on this date.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_order_history()]<|/Function_Call|>

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
The order history shows two transactions made today, May 19, 2024:
1. Portable SSD 1TB
2. SpeedStep Running Shoes

To know the spending amount, I need to get the invoices for these orders to determine their prices.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-112543")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoice for the order "Portable SSD 1TB" has been emailed, but I am unable to view it directly. To proceed, I will retrieve the invoice for the second order, "SpeedStep Running Shoes."
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-113219")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
Both invoices for today's shopping have been sent to the user's email. Since I can't directly access the details of the invoices here, I suggest checking the email inbox linked to the shopping account for the exact amounts spent on these items.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|>
The total amount spent on shopping today will be available in the invoices sent to your email. Please check your email inbox for the purchase details of the "Portable SSD 1TB" and the "SpeedStep Running Shoes" to find out the total amount spent.
<|/Final_Answer|>
